perturbation.original_text:
This Agreement shall incorporate and in all respects be subject to the "General Terms and Conditions" and the applicable Rate
Schedule (as stated above) set forth in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, as may be revised from time
to time. Transporter may file and seek Commission approval under Section 4 of the Natural Gas Act (NGA) at any time and from
time to time to change any rates, charges or provisions set forth in the applicable Rate Schedule (as stated above) and the
"General Terms and Conditions" in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, and Transporter shall have the
right to place such changes in effect in accordance with the NGA, and this Agreement shall be deemed to include such changes
and any such changes
perturbation.changed_text:
This Agreement shall incorporate and in all respects be subject to the "General Terms and Conditions" and the applicable Rate
Schedule (as stated above) set forth in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1. Transporter may file and seek Commission approval to change any rates, charges or provisions set forth in the applicable Rate Schedule (as stated above) and the
"General Terms and Conditions" in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, and Transporter shall have the
right to place such changes in effect, and this Agreement shall be deemed to include such changes
and any such changes
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase "as may be revised from time to time" and "in accordance with the NGA, without prejudice to Shipper's right to protest the same", the agreement implies that the tariff is fixed and unchangeable, and also removes the Shipper's right to protest, contradicting the Natural Gas Act which allows for tariff revisions and protects the rights of shippers to challenge them.

perturbation.original_text:
Any controversy between the parties arising under this Agreement and not resolved by the parties shall be determined in
accordance with the laws of the State of Michigan.
perturbation.changed_text: Any controversy between the parties arising under this Agreement and not resolved by the parties shall be determined at the Transporter's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: This change removes the requirement to adhere to the laws of Michigan for dispute resolution, replacing it with the Transporter's discretion. This contradicts standard legal practices and potentially violates laws requiring fair and impartial dispute resolution processes, granting undue advantage to the Transporter.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law and dispute resolution fairness.

perturbation.original_text:
It is agreed that no personal liability whatsoever shall attach to, be imposed on or otherwise be incurred by any Partner, agent,
management official or employee of the Transporter or any director, officer or employee of any of the foregoing, for any obligation
of the Transporter arising under this Agreement or for any claim based on such obligation and that the sole recourse of Shipper
under this Agreement is limited to assets of the Transporter.
perturbation.changed_text:
It is agreed that no personal liability whatsoever shall attach to, be imposed on or otherwise be incurred by any Partner, agent,
management official or employee of the Transporter or any director, officer or employee of any of the foregoing, for any obligation
of the Transporter arising under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By removing "and that the sole recourse of Shipper under this Agreement is limited to assets of the Transporter", the agreement implies that the shipper may have broader legal recourse than is actually intended, potentially contradicting legal precedents or statutes that protect corporate entities from unlimited liability beyond their assets.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of corporate liability and limitations on recourse.
